title: Home Depot
description: Home Depot is recognized for its vibrant orange color, represented by the hex code F96302. This distinctive shade is prominently featured in the company's branding and marketing materials. The orange hue not only represents the brand's lively and energetic feel but also ensures high visibility and recognition. This color information is detailed in their official brand guidelines, which can be found in their publication for the second quarter of 2021 on their corporate website.
